Skill.Name: Better Mousetrap
Skill.Description: Roll a 1d12 when a trap goes off if its equal to or lowered than the models Ag that set the trap the trap does x2 damage

RequiresPermission.Name: Trap Setter
RequiresPermission.SpeciesCanEquip: Human Mutant Genics_A Genics_B Aquatic Angelic Demonic Fun
